title: DADA
content:
Hi,  
Im doing some work based on the Dadaist style for my graphics course  
Im looking for some suitable typeface (preferably free ones, being a poor student after all!) that reflect this style. Think 1920's Berlin dada, very narrow, tall letters, block serifs etc.  
Thanks
author: Mrpie42

comments.content: You might want to see this thread on Dadaist typefaces... [http://www.typophile.com/node/30008](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417042505/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30008 "http://www.typophile.com/node/30008")
